Ripper


he drops hot rod and pulls savanna dead body out of hot rod and digs a hole 
sticks her in it then turns to talk to him




Ripper:



"hot rod you, spitfire, and savanna went into battle but they were both dead 
we barely got there in time to save you  brooder,steel,Stomper, and me did 
all we could but it was not enough."








he falls to the ground in a sitting postion and looks at all them and says

Ripper:



"war is hard."
